panels.description: $Cluster: Jet jobs are uniquely identified by the Jet generated job IDs. In addition to Jet IDs, each job can be optionally set a unique job name by the application.
panels.title: Job Identifications

panels.description: $Cluster: Max items/bytes read from the sources of the jobs, max items/bytes written to the sinks of the jobs.
panels.title: Max Items Flow: $JobId

panels.description: $Cluster: The number of received items. This number does not include watermarks, snapshot barriers etc. It’s the number of items the Processor.process method will receive.
panels.title: Received Count: $JobId

panels.description: $Cluster: The number of received items. This number does not include watermarks, snapshot barriers etc. It’s the number of items the Processor.process method will receive.
panels.title: Emitted Count: $JobId

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of items received from remote members.
panels.title: Items In: $JobId

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of bytes received from remote members.
panels.title: Bytes In: $JobId

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of items sent to remote members.
panels.title: Items Out: $JobId

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of bytes sent to remote members.
panels.title: Items Out: $JobId
